portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js and Shadcn UI, featuring animations and responsive design.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform based on React and Node.js, supporting user authentication, product management, and payment features.

social.title: Social Media Application
social.description: A social media platform developed with MERN stack, supporting real-time chat and post sharing.
